# Expected CLI Outputs for Testing

## Init Command Success
Project initialized successfully at ./myproject

## Start Command Success
Starting Pylight server on 0.0.0.0:8000
Server started successfully

## Migrate Command Success
Database migrations applied successfully

## Generate Command Success
Code generated for table: users

## Reflect Command Success
Database schema reflected successfully

## Error: Missing Required Option
Error: Missing required option: --config

## Error: Invalid Choice
Error: Invalid choice: invalid_value. Choose from: [valid1, valid2, valid3]
